scripts.dev: concurrently -k -s first -n backend,frontend "go run ./cmd/server" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.e2e: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/release-e2e-ports.ps1 && npm run e2e:run
scripts.e2e:run: concurrently -k -s first -n backend,frontend "go run ./cmd/server" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "wait-on http-get://localhost:5173 http-get://localhost:8080/health && npx playwright test --config=e2e/browser/playwright.config.js"
